info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Snow White's Apple
collection.openText: The day a ripe apple fell off the tree in the garden where the princess and the king stood, the witch's heart shattered.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Normal, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a normal probability.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a high probability.
When $0 escaped from its containment, it began to spread its roots and branches along the ground of the area it was in. Those withered vines slowed employees, hampering their movement.
Once the area was completely filled with $0’s roots and branches, it moved to another to grow even more. When $0 was eventually suppressed, its flora did not disappear until the next day.
